column2:
"Poppoâ™ª It's Popona!
<%me>, you came at just the right time!"
"I have this badmouth partner called Hatosuke, but it seems like I lost him when I came to this world."
"I hope he's OK... What if he's wandered into some kitchen and been made into yakitori?"
"Huh? If you were a bird, you know exactly where you'd go? Really?!"
"In that case, please help me! Go and look for Hatosuke in my place!"
